item.description:
Thomas has suggested a movie tonight for anyone interesred:

Not Quite Hollywood
Synopsis...
Examines Australian "Ozploitation" genre cinema from the 1970s and 1980s, as well as the auteurs and actors who brought the films to life....

venue:
Kendall Square Cinema
1 Kendall Square
Cambridge MA 02139

Starts at 7.20 so lets try and meet there between 7 - 7.15.

http://boston.mrmovie...

Sorry for the late notice, this showing finishes on Thursday.

RSVP if you interested.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Movie: Not Quite Hollywood
